cta.tooltip: View the trailer for Rescue 3D featuring Air Force Captain Lauren Ross
cta.title: Rescue 3D
cta.copy:
Rescue plunges audiences into the challenging, inspiring work of saving lives in the face of a natural disaster. Behind the scenes, the film follows Air Force Pilot Capt. Lauren Ross and other rescuers as they train for action. When an earthquake strikes Haiti, creating one of the biggest humanitarian disasters of the century, the audience is swept along, joining the massive effort that brings military and civilian responders from around the world. Rescue is a journey of real-world disaster and emergency response captured in 3D with unprecented scale and impact for the giant screen.
